example.parse: (NP-TPC-1 (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_DU_NOM اللاعبان) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_DU_NOM القويان)) (VP (IV3MD+IV+IVSUFF_SUBJ:D_MOOD:I يسارعان) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP-CLR (PREP الى) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN ملء) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN البنك))) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الارباح))))) (PUNC ,) (PP (PREP م) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يقنع) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الصغار)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_GEN حرق) (NP-SBJ (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_GEN بعض) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم))) (NP-OBJ (DET+NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_ACC البعض)))))
